EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-08-16-Q3 Partner Town Hall Meeting.EMAIL-Follow Up Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Catch the Partner Town Hall Meeting Recording Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Sorry we missed you at our Quarterly Partner Town Hall Meeting! We get it, things come up and days get busy. Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/partner-portal/overview]]> If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or email partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. Best, The Turbonomic Team
